author: Daniel Greene
description:
Welcome back to Fantasy News!
In today’s episode:

🔥 A new Cosmere project surfaces with a cover reveal
⚖️ A judge rules on a massive AI copyright case — and it’s not the best news
🎬 Sci-fi legend Adrian Tchaikovsky is getting a movie adaptation
⚔️ Witcher drama continues as the author shades GRRM
🎲 Plus: Malazan art, Bobiverse updates, LOTR board game, Ghostbloods developments, and more!

⏱️ Timestamps & Source Links:
00:00 intro
01:12 – New Witcher Cover
01:53 – Witcher Author Throws Shade at GRRM
04:32 – Sci-Fi GOAT Returns
05:45 – Adrian Tchaikovsky Movie
06:10 – (Bobiverse covers – Daniel exclusive!)
08:04 – A River From The Sky
09:41 – The Faith of Beasts
10:37 – The Language of Liars
11:23 – Tailored Realities
12:26 – New Malazan Art
13:09 – Worldcon Panel Highlights
14:22 – Ghostbloods Update (Cosmere)
15:31 – Project Hail Mary Trailer
17:21 – The Odyssey Movie Poster
17:50 – New Lord of the Rings Board Game
18:11 – Akira Canceled Again
18:42 – New James Bond Director
19:33 –
title: Sanderson’s Sci-fi Reveal! MAJOR AI Copyright Ruling, New Witcher Book | FN
